title: Iron in a dream / Interpretation of an iron dream for a man, a married woman, and a single woman

preview.html: We continue, with God’s blessing, to provide the interpretation of seeing iron in a dream. In this article we will discover many mysteries and secrets, solutions to the iron dream through the interpretation of Ibn Sirin, as well as through the modern approach to dream interpretation based on the rules of analytical psychology founded by Freud. Discover the meaning of iron leaving the body and mouth in a dream, as well as holding iron in the hand. While we talk about smelting and melting iron, we wish everyone an enjoyable and useful continuation, God willing. Iron in a dream or the interpretation of a dream about iron / Ibn Sirin. Iron is mentioned in the famous book (Interpretation of Great Dreams) attributed to The scholar Sheikh Muhammad bin Shirin in the fortieth chapter, which is related to (gold, silver, jewel colours, jewels and everything extracted from metals such as lead, copper, shell, oil, scratch, glass, etc.) Iron and the like). Translation: God Almighty said in Surah Al-Hadid (the verse). 25): Iron in a dream is money, power, and honor, and eating it with bread is kindness and patience for the sake of living, and chewing it in a dream indicates gossip, and iron is also victory, profit, triumph, and success. . It was narrated on the authority of a man who came to Jaafar al-Sadiq and said: I saw that my Lord gave me iron and gave me vinegar to drink. May God bless him and grant him peace. Vinegar in dreams is permissible money. Interpretation of iron in one dream. Iron in a dream symbolizes the girl’s toughness and the strength of her character, and molten or reddish iron indicates intense passion. It is as if you are holding a piece of iron and putting it in the fire, and this is the interpretation of marriage. It is good for a girl to see that she is working as a blacksmith, because this is interpreted as a good deed or useful work, and perhaps iron indicates the recovery of the sick. Iron in a dream of a married woman and a pregnant woman. A married woman sees in her dream that her husband is buying a lot of iron for construction. This interpretation is good. Rusted iron represents corrupt money or money that was not spent for benefit. However, if a married woman sees that her house is built with iron, this is her interpretation of family cohesion and continuity, and she dreams that she is holding iron in her hand because this could represent money. As for a pregnant woman who sees in her dream a piece of iron coming out of her body or from her mouth, this is her interpretation of a male child, and knowledge For God alone. Iron in the dream of a single and married man. A man who sees in a dream that he is eating iron, then in his wakefulness he works in a field that is difficult and difficult, but at the same time profitable, in the dream, then in his wakefulness he is strong and fortified. If he sees in a dream that he is fighting with an iron man and dominating him, then in reality he will overcome his serious problems and successfully overcome them.

title: Interpretation of a dream about lice in the hair and killing a married woman

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about hair lice and killing it by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream about hair lice and killing it has many meanings. In this dream, it can refer to good, and it can also refer to evil. As many scholars specializing in the world of dream interpretation say. When the dreamer sees lice in When he sleeps, this makes him very anxious and afraid. That is why the dreamer begins to search for an explanation for this disturbing dream. The reason for this is that lice are among the insects that cause distress to humans. That is why the dreamer searches for the answers that suit him, to get rid of this hateful and annoying insect. See also: Interpretation of lice falling from the hair in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about lice in the hair and killing a married woman. They said that scholars interpret dreams when the dreamer saw lice in the life of a married woman and was killed. This indicates that the married woman will get rid of all the problems present in her married life in the previous period of time. Such as when she sees lice in the life of a married woman and is killed. For a married woman, this is considered a dream of lice in the hair and then killing them. This indicates that worries, problems, and sorrows will be able to be solved. The scholar and commentator Ibn Sirin said: If a married woman dreams that she is killing lice in her dream. This indicates that this vision is a good vision. Such as when a married woman kills lice in her dream. This indicates that this married woman will be relieved of her problems and that God Almighty will manage her affairs and ease her distress, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. But if a married woman dreams that she sees a lice biting her. This indicates, according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin, as it indicates lack of sustenance and extreme poverty, as well as a narrow situation. The interpreter Ibn Sirin also said: If a married woman sees lice walking on her clothes, this of course indicates that her husband will reach a high and great position. It also indicates that her married life will be happy and that her In general, it will improve for the better. But if a married woman dreams that she is throwing lice in a far direction and does not kill them. This is evidence that the married woman will do something that is contrary to Islamic law and morals. Interpretation of a dream about hair lice and killing it for a pregnant woman: A dream about lice in the hair and killing a pregnant woman has many interpretations, which are as follows: When a pregnant woman sees that lice are present in large quantities in her hair. This indicates that her birth will be easy, simple, and without any problem for her. Also, when a pregnant woman dreams that she felt a very strong lice bite. This indicates that there are some people who speak ill of her. And they do not wish her well or gossip about her. But if a married woman dreams that she killed this lice, this indicates that she will eliminate everyone who talks to her and treats her rudely. Likewise, if a pregnant woman dreams that she got rid of all the lice in her hair, this is an interpretation that The life of this pregnant woman will be good, happy, and blessed. God Almighty will also make her birth easy and simple. Also, you will have a good son with both father and mother. We have chosen for you: Interpretation of a dream about lice in hair. Interpretation of seeing lice in a dream and killing them. Interpretation of a dream about lice in a dream and then killing them. This can be explained

title: Interpretation of cannabis in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Weeds in a dream are among the strange visions that raise confusion and question whether it is a good or bad vision, but according to dream interpreters, this dream has many interpretations and varies from man to woman. It can indicate escape and abandonment of responsibility. Other times it is evidence of losing money or stability in life. Weeds in a dream Searching for green grass in a dream for consumption is evidence that the dreamer has a weak character and always follows the wrong ways to solve his problems. Seeing green grass in a dream is evidence of finding solutions to many problems. And getting rid of sorrows. Drugs in a dream are evidence that the dreamer finds it difficult to accept himself and escapes from facing his mistakes, so he resorts to drugs, which is evidence of the problems and difficulties that surround him in reality and he is unable to solve or deal with them. Seeing cannabis in a dream is evidence that the dreamer has suffered From a strong shock in an incident such as the death and loss of one of his relatives. Drugs are evidence of a person’s absence from his reality and his exposure to loss due to lack of interest in his life’s path. Hashish in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin suggests that seeing a married woman in a dream carrying cannabis is evidence of the abundance of food, money and children. It is a sign of relief from the pain, sorrow, and problems that you were exposed to in the previous period. The man’s search for hashish to drink in his dream is evidence of his misbehavior and misguidance, and it is evidence of his abstention and deviation from the straight path, and that all he thinks about are his personal whims and goals. And neglecting his health and money. Cannabis in a dream is considered evidence of illegal ways to earn, staying away from what is permissible, and falling into the trap of sadness and sorrow. Drugs in a dream are an indication of unreasonable behavior in all aspects of life, in addition to being evidence of the inability to bear the hardships of life and its owners. Herb in a dream by Al-Osaimi Al-Osaimi believes that seeing green grass in a dream indicates that the dreamer is committing many sins and transgressions and is a sign of turning away from God and walking in the path of forbidden and immoral things. Eating hashish in a dream is evidence that the dreamer is a weak person who feels humiliated and is easy to lead. It is also an indication of The dreamer is dealing with psychological problems and internal conflicts that he cannot reveal. Seeing grass in abundance is a sign that the person is tired of his life and is looking for change. Weeds in a dream for Nabulsi. From the point of view that the cannabis plant was planted in a pot and not in the ground, this indicates marriage and moving. To another life. Seeing hashish planted in the mosque or at home in a dream brings with it evil for its owner. Blue smoke in a dream is evidence of psychological and physical harm to which the dreamer is exposed by his family and friends. Sheikh Abdul Ghani Al-Nabulsi believes that smoking hashish in a happy dream is A sign of loneliness and his need for friends in his life. If an unmarried woman smokes hashish, this is evidence that she is a girl with a bad reputation and far from morals and customs. Marijuana in a dream for a married woman. If she sees...

title: Interpretation of a dream about removing hair from the legs

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about removing leg hair, especially since it is considered one of the wondrous visions that arouse astonishment and astonishment in the dreamer’s soul, as it is considered one of the puzzling visions, and many scholars and dream interpretation experts explain the interpretations, meanings and connotations contained in these dreams, because they differ from one viewer to another, and in this article We explain the interpretation of seeing leg hair removed in a dream.Interpretation of a dream about removing hair from the legs.It should be noted that removing leg hair in a woman’s dream is evidence that she will begin a life full of positives and also includes other interpretations that can be good, and here we learn about the interpretation of the dream about removing hair from the legs is also: If a bachelor is exposed to many financial crises in real life. And he saw in a dream that he was removing hair from his legs, then this dream indicates that he will have a lot of money and get rid of all the debts that he owes. Also seeing leg hair removed in the dream of an unmarried girl. It is A sign that he will get rid of all the problems and fears that he suffers from in this life and enjoy peace of mind and peace of mind. If a girl sees that she is removing her leg hair, then in reality she has many debts. The dream indicates that she will have a lot of money and get rid of all her debts in this life See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a selfie in a dream, one of the most famous scholars of complete interpretation. Interpretation of a dream about removing hair from the legs in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Imam Ibn Sirin also worked hard to clarify these interpretations and interpretations that included this dream. It is one of the strange dreams that may haunt many, and its interpretations vary depending on The social status of the person who saw this dream, and in this paragraph we will explain the interpretation of the dream of removing hair from the legs in a dream by Ibn Sirin. It also: Imam Ibn Sirin says that the vision of removing leg hair in a dream is for an unmarried girl, as a long time has passed. This dream indicates that this The girl will face a lot of problems with some close friends who are planning to harm her. Although the girl is suffering, and financial crises in real life. And he sees in a dream that he shaves the hair on his legs and gets rid of them, then this dream indicates that he will eliminate all problems soon, and it also alleviates Anxiety and relieves it. Also, if a girl sees that she is removing white hair from her legs. It shows that she will pay off all her debts soon and will get a promotion at work, which is the reason for an increase in income. If he suffers from an illness and sees this dream, this is a sign of a speedy recovery. See also: Interpretation of dreams to see loud laughter in a dream by the most famous interpretation scholars. Interpretation of seeing leg hair removed in a dream for a married woman. It should be noted that seeing hair removed on the legs differs in the interpretations and interpretations it includes, if it appears in a married woman’s dream, as it can be positive suggestions and heralds her With kindness and happiness, and in those lines I explain the interpretation of seeing leg hair removed in a dream for a married woman is also: If a married woman sees her leg hair in a dream. He says

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a red chair in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a red chair in a dream Interpretation: Seeing a red chair at home in a dream is a sign of understanding a harmonious family. Also, seeing a red work chair in a dream indicates appropriate changes in the dreamer’s life. Seeing many chairs in a dream also means success, success, and overcoming failure. Seeing a red chair in a dream also means success, success, and overcoming failure. Gold in a dream indicates strength, respect, and an excellent position among people. The interpretation of seeing a red chair in a dream is a sign of kindness, nourishment, and problem solving. Seeing a broken red chair in a dream means misfortunes and disasters for its owners. Red chair in a single woman’s dream. Seeing a red chair in a dream indicates for a single woman To love and enjoyable and successful relationships in her life. Also, seeing a red chair in a girl’s dream is a sign of engagement and a happy marriage. Also, seeing many chairs that are red in color indicates joys, happiness, and the coming of joy. The interpretation of seeing a broken chair in a girl’s dream is evidence of the failure of the relationship that It will end. The red chair in a married woman’s dream. The interpretation of seeing a red chair in a dream for a married woman is evidence of a successful and stable marital relationship. One of the desirable dreams for a married woman is to see her husband sitting in a red chair, as this indicates that he has a lot of sustenance. Also, seeing many Chairs in women’s dreams mean that goodness and joys will come to her and her family’s life. The chair in Al-Osaimi’s dream. Seeing yourself sitting in a wheelchair in a dream means success and achieving goals and desires. Also, seeing a chair in a dream indicates the high status that the dreamer enjoys among people. Seeing Many chairs in a dream is a good omen and a sign of happiness and good news. Interpretation of seeing someone you love in a wheelchair. Seeing someone you love sitting in a wheelchair in a dream indicates intense love and attachment to this person. Interpretation of seeing the same person sitting in a wooden wheelchair in a dream shows hypocrisy People. Seeing living room chairs in a dream. The interpretation of seeing living room chairs in a dream is evidence of the happy circumstances that the dreamer will enjoy. Seeing dining chairs in a dream indicates good relationships and success and shows a strong, interconnected family. Seeing many chairs in a dream. Many chairs indicate in The dream indicates that the dreamer will feel comfortable in his coming days and that his life will be free of problems. Seeing many chairs in a dream is desirable and indicates one’s vision of goodness, prosperity, and the end of sorrows. Seeing many chairs in a dream, as Al-Nabulsi mentions, is evidence of freedom from Trouble.But the presence of broken chairs in the dream indicates that the dreamer will face some problems during this period.If you have a dream that you want to interpret, put it in a comment below and a team of experts will respond to you as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of seeing a wedding in a dream by Ibn Sirin for unmarried women

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing marriage in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Many interpretive scholars have worked to provide many connotations and interpretations of seeing a wedding in a dream, and among the most prominent and important of these scholars was the scholar Ibn Sirin. Regarding the details of the dream, there are many people searching for an interpretation of seeing a wedding in a dream according to Ibn Sirin, as he is one of the most famous scholars of interpretation. Interpretation of seeing marriage in a dream by Ibn Sirin. It should be noted that Ibn Sirin is considered one of the most famous scholars of interpretation, as many people rely on his interpretations to know Meanings and meanings of the dreams that they see in their dreams. Marriage in a dream is a dream that heralds goodness and blessings. If the person who saw in a dream that he is getting married is unemployed, this indicates that he will find a job in the near future. If the dreamer is single and sees himself marrying a beautiful woman, This indicates that he will soon marry a good woman. If a married man sees that he is marrying another unknown woman, this indicates the imminent pregnancy of his wife, his great love for his partner, and his intense devotion to her. When the dreamer is going through a financial crisis and sees that he will get married, this indicates an improvement in his financial situation. And gain a large amount of money. See also: Interpretation of seeing zigzag in a dream of a single or married woman by Ibn Sirin, Al-Usaimi and Imam Al-Sadiq. Interpretation of seeing marriage in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq. Imam Al-Sadiq worked to provide a set of connotations and interpretations of seeing marriage in a dream, and his interpretations did not differ much from the interpretations of the scholar Ibn Sirin. The following: Getting married in a dream is a sign of earning a lot of money and wealth. If a person is sick and sees himself getting married in a dream, this is a sign of his recovery in the near future. Seeing marriage is a sign of success in work and achieving many achievements in the coming period. See also: Interpretation of seeing a bed in a dream for single women and married women, by Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen. Interpretation of seeing a wedding party in a dream for a single woman. An unmarried girl is considered a girl who has never been married. She may see a group of dreams in her dream that are generally a good sign for her. Interpretation scholars have worked to clarify the effects of marriage in an unmarried girl’s dream as follows: Marriage in an unmarried woman’s dream is an indication that she will marry in the near future a good man who has good morals and fears God Almighty. If an unmarried girl dreams that she is marrying a strange man This indicates her failure in some future matters, but she should not give up and continue trying until she succeeds. If an unmarried girl gets engaged and sees her wedding ceremony and her partner is not with her, this actually indicates her separation from her partner. Marriage in one’s dream means the end of anxiety and worries and liberation. The girl from the problems and troubles that she suffered from. The marriage of an unmarried girl to her lover in a dream indicates that she will be promoted at work in the near future. title: What is the interpretation of seeing a neighbor in a dream and what does it indicate?

preview.html: Seeing a neighbor in a dream and the neighbor is the one who lives next to you, or in the same house or building, and the neighbor is mentioned in the Holy Qur’an, as well as the Sun of the Messenger. At the hands of the Prophet and Messenger of God, he advised the neighbor to do good, and the neighbor did what the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, recommended. We get them from trusted neighbors, from friends and family, from them and from the annoying person. Whoever creates trouble and tries to stay away from it as much as possible, if he sees a kind and cooperative neighbor, this indicates the goodness of the person and hearing good news, just as the neighbor shows the disappearance of tension. And sadness. Interpretation of neighbors seeing only children. If a girl sees her neighbor’s son in her dream, perhaps he is thinking about her, or is busy with her, or feels love for him. Also, seeing the neighbor’s children in a dream is a promising vision that indicates that she will get rid of evil people and that her condition will be good. Interpretation Dreaming of joy with neighborsSeeing a neighbor in a dream Seeing joy in neighbors is one of the promising visions that indicate hearing good news and the disappearance of tension and pain. Interpretation of a dream about a neighbor’s daughter’s engagement: If an unmarried girl sees that the neighbor’s son is engaged to her, this is a good vision and indicates that her engagement is approaching. It also indicates Hearing the Gospel. Seeing a neighbor in a dream. This vision is a good indicator of distinction and success in academic or professional life. Interpretation of a dream about a neighbor’s son marrying an unmarried woman. Seeing a girl whom a neighbor’s son is marrying or proposing to, this is a vision that expresses the imminence of her marriage. The vision of an unmarried girl shows that The marriage of her neighbor’s son is a positive sign of moving from her current home to a new home and her academic excellence if she is a student. Interpretation of a dream about the death of a neighbor’s son for a single woman. Seeing a neighbor in a dream. Seeing a single girl seeing the death of a neighbor’s son is evidence of getting rid of enemies and removing her worries and pain. Seeing the death of someone she knows does not Being buried indicates a benefit that must be obtained and something that needs to be done. Seeing the death of a neighbor indicates nostalgia for the past. Interpretation of a dream about joy with neighbors. Whoever sees joy in the neighbors indicates positive changes in the deity and a new life, and the vision indicates a lot of goodness for the monarch and in hearing Annunciation. Interpretation of a dream about a girl from the neighbors calling for joy. Seeing a call for joy in a dream means happy news and circumstances. The vision may indicate an abundance of money, achieving the goals planned by the priest, and the girl’s resolve indicates marriage as well as an unmarried young man. Seeing a neighbor in a dream is seeing a party The wedding of a neighbor's daughter means that the dreamer will find a prestigious job and be successful. Interpretation of a dream of an invitation to a wedding for a married woman in the neighborhood. Seeing receiving a wedding invitation in a dream is one of the good visions that indicate good news. If the married woman shows happiness and stability in her life. Wedding invitation If you see yourself accepting a wedding invitation for a woman who is married to her neighbor, this means good news, just as seeing a wedding with an unknown person in a dream indicates good news. title: Interpretation of a dream about a child drowning in a dream and its interpretation by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a child drowning and its interpretation by Ibn Sirin is one of the tense, frightening and frightening dreams for the dreamer, because the drowning of a child in real life is one of the things that puts pressure on a person. a lot. We find that there are many scholars and interpreters who have arrived and have interpreted many dreams, and have published some books on the interpretation of dreams. Today, through our article, we will learn about the interpretation of a dream about a child drowning. Interpretation of a dream about a child drowningSeeing a small child drowning in a dream is a sign for the dreamer that he will soon be able to Of victory and defeat of his opponents and enemies. Translators and jurists have mentioned that seeing a male child in a dream is a sign of problems and misfortunes that befall the dreamer, as it has some other various signs, which are: Seeing an ugly child drowning in a dream, even seeing that he died at that time, indicates that there is an enemy far from God. The Almighty says that he will die, causing a lot of pain to the dreamer. The ugly the face of a drowning child in a dream is, the more it indicates what the dreamer is going through in his life, as it shows the bad ending that the dreamer is going through. If the drowning child in the dream has blond hair, In addition to his beautiful face, this indicates the presence of a cunning and false enemy in the dreamer's life, hiding behind a mask of sincerity and love, seeking to destroy the dreamer's life. Life by all possible means. Also, in the case of a child drowning in a dream, the dreamer’s permanent and continuous concern for his children from all the consequences and problems that those around them may face. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a wedding dress by Ibn Sirin and its most prominent connotations and interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about a child drowning and saving him. Many interpreters and jurists have explained That there are many indications that the child drowned in the dream and work is done to save him, and that the psychological state of the dreamer in the dream plays a major role in achieving the appropriate interpretation and the social status of the dreamer in the dream. Real life, so the interpretation of a child drowning in a dream and saving him is as follows: If the dreamer sees himself saving the child in a dream, this is a sign of his continuous effort to work to achieve all the dreams and aspirations he seeks, as he makes a great effort to reach them. To them by all means. Also, seeing yourself drowning in a dream indicates the dreamer’s sins, as he is immersed in the pleasures of this world, abandoning religion and the afterlife, but this is a sign of his great ability to overcome himself to return to the truth. Road. As for the dreamer who watches the process of rescuing a drowning person in a dream, this is a sign that he has gotten rid of all the psychological problems he suffered from in the previous period. Finally, when the dreamer saves someone, whether a relative or acquaintance, this is a sign that he will reconcile with someone Close to him and dear to him. See also: Interpretation of dreams about the dead returning to life in a dream and its most important indications according to Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream of a child drowning for a married woman. As for a married woman, saving the child of one of her enemies in a dream is a sign that God Almighty will have pity on her, as it is likely that Losing something very dear to him, and to

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a lover in our house for single people

preview.html: Seeing a lover is considered one of the visions that bring many good impressions to the same visionary, as all dreams about love make many people happy, but the interpretation of this vision varies depending on the version of the divine and the nature of the vision. And through the following lines we will explain that, so stay with us. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a lover in our house for singles: If an unmarried woman sees her lover at home in her dream, this may be evidence of good news that the official date of this girl’s marriage to her lover is approaching. Also, if a woman sees If a single woman dreams that her current lover is at home, this may be a sign that happy news is coming to her and that it will change her life for the better. However, if a single woman sees in her dream that her lover is in her house and there were problems between them at that time, this may be an indication of her desire In ending all the problems that exist between them. Also, if an unmarried woman sees her ex-lover in her home, this may indicate that she may face some problems and crises through her work or studies. If an unmarried woman sees her ex-lover in her dream, this may be a sign of The dreamer's longing to return to the past and reject the reality in which he lives now. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that her ex-lover is in her house, this may be a sign that the unmarried woman is constantly thinking about her lover. If an unmarried woman sees her ex-lover in her dream This may mean that many positive changes will occur in this girl’s life in the coming period. When an unmarried woman sees her ex-lover in her dream, this may mean her desire to return to her lover again. Interpretation of dreams of seeing a lover in our house for a single woman by Ibn Sirin, Ibn Sirin indicates Sirin indicates that if an unmarried woman sees her lover in her home, she may think about the future with this lover. Ibn Sirin states that if an unmarried woman dreams of her ex-lover in her home, it could be a sign of involving the mind and heart at all times. Ibn Sirin confirms that if In her dream, an unmarried woman saw her lover in her house. This could be an indication of the approaching marriage and the conclusion of a marriage contract, and it also indicates engagement and agreement on key points. Ibn Sirin claims that if an unmarried woman dreams that her lover is in her house. This could mean engaging in Long-term projects, because it suggests cooperation in future plans and goals with your loved one. Ibn Sirin explains that if an unmarried woman sees a woman in her dream, the lover is at home. It could be an indication of the need to review oneself and think carefully before making any decision. When she dreams An unmarried woman has her lover at home. This may indicate the need to be careful and stay away from blind trust and exaggeration in love. And when an unmarried woman sees that her lover is at home then she refuses to come. This may indicate hesitation and an inability to make a decision, and therefore it is necessary Be patient and cautious, as it indicates that he is unable to bear the responsibilities of a person

title: Interpretation of a dream about removing black lice from the hair of an unmarried woman

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about removing black lice from the hair of an unmarried woman. The meaning of this and the topics contained in the dream require interpretation, and more than one interpreter has expressed their opinion on this dream, such as Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Sirin. He is one of the most important scholars in interpreting dreams and in clarifying all the mysteries that the appearance of lice brings in The dream, whether in the hair, the vulva, or the body in general. Interpretation of a dream about removing black lice from the hair of an unmarried woman. Black lice are among the insects that cause anxiety when they appear in a dream, especially in women. Seeing lice has many meanings for single people, including: Lice in an unmarried woman’s dream is evidence of enemies and that someone is trying to harm her. It may indicate that the enemy is close but weak. When you see lice on clothes, it is good skin, but if it is in the hair, it is The bad thing is that he finds it and teaches it. Killing lice in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates victory over the enemy and that he is a weak person. Killing is evidence of freedom from worry until the end. White lice show relief and take out fears. However, it is undesirable when it occurs in sensitive areas such as The vulva. The spread of white lice on the body is evidence of many sins. Killing it indicates survival and the end of the worries that the girl was carrying. If white lice died in a dream, this is a sign of despair about something. The concentration of lice on clothes indicates a scandal. Lice indicate Black in the fiancé’s hair in a dream indicates problems with her fiancé. It is a sign of envy. See also: Interpretation of a dream about hair lice Removing black lice from Ibn Sirin’s hair There is a need for individuals to interpret a dream about removing black lice from the hair of an unmarried woman so that she is not stressed and anxious, Ibn Sirin reported, The most prominent dream interpreter says: Lice are a weak enemy and can be brothers. Killing black lice is evidence of getting rid of the enemy. Removing lice from the hair indicates getting rid of bad thinking about things and is evidence of realizing the bad faith of those around you. Removing black lice by hand means that the dreamer is aware of the enemies around her, and that she is able to avoid harm and take precautions. Necessary. The hairstyle and the falling lice are evidence of the emergence of the truth of the hypocrites and the revelation of the people, and it is a failure for the girl to escape from the malice of her enemies. Removing the black lice and killing them indicates comfort and relief from distress, but getting rid of the live lice shows that the girl is far from the law of God Almighty. Seeing a person Another pulling lice from a girl’s head indicates that he is someone who wishes her well, someone who can help her at any time when needed. Interpretation of pubic lice for unmarried women Sometimes a girl sees black lice in the pubic area during a dream, which is strange and needs clarification as follows: Black lice On the pubic or vulva is evidence that someone is stalking the girl and wants to discredit her. It shows that someone thinks badly about the girl and wants to do bad things. Cleaning the pubic from black lice means getting rid of the accusation or acquittal of a certain sin. It is evidence of the girl’s purity and injustice. .Cleaning the pubic cavity and
